posts.postText:
Harry Potter dies in the last movie, yes, LAST HP MOVIE EVER. Voldemort dies. And, Snape was always in love with Harry Potters'' mother. 

UMADBRO?
This is my last post and time you shall ever see me associate myself with this community, I am totally just shocked. You have ruined my entire existence.

>> Harry Potter dies in the last movie, yes, LAST HP MOVIE EVER. Voldemort dies. And, Snape was always in love with Harry Potters'' mother. 

UMADBRO? 

How dare you spoil a book that has been out for four years.
YOU MONSTER!
If you had read the book you'd know that he dies, becomes the master of death, revives, Kills Voldemort, fucks Ron's sister, and has many ugly children.
Which then become possesed by Voldemort.
I was told that the movie ends with a massive violent orgy with Voldemort, Dumbledore, Harry, and Ron's mom.
mark i am disappoint in you
Never cared for the books or the movies, and, I still don't care.
